Parameter.name: Model
Parameter.description: Model of the equipment to use

Parameter.name: IP
Parameter.description: ip address of the equipment

Parameter.name: ConfigurationWaitingTime
Parameter.description: Time to wait after the configuration step (in second)

Parameter.name: username
Parameter.description: login used for the connection

Parameter.name: password
Parameter.description: password used for the connection

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.description: SSID to create

Parameter.name: passphrase_WEP64
Parameter.description: passphrase for WEP 64 bits

Parameter.name: passphrase_WEP128
Parameter.description: passphrase for WEP 128 bits

Parameter.name: passphrase_WPA
Parameter.description: passphrase for WPA

Parameter.name: passphrase_WPA2
Parameter.description: passphrase for WPA2

Parameter.name: radiusip
Parameter.description: IP of the Radius server

Parameter.name: radiusport
Parameter.description: Listening port of the radius server

Parameter.name: radiussecret
Parameter.description: Secret password to connect AP to the Radius server

Parameter.name: EAP_user
Parameter.description: login used for EAP encryption

Parameter.name: EAP_password
Parameter.description: password used for EAP encryption

Parameter.name: EAP_SIM_user
Parameter.description: SIM user specified in radius server configuration

Parameter.name: EAP_AKA_user
Parameter.description: AKA user specified in radius server configuration

Parameter.name: Credential_password
Parameter.description: credential password for EAP encryption. For ICS, the credential password is also the digit PIN code to lock the phone and the phone should not be initialy locked with a PIN, password nor patern

Parameter.name: CA_guard_password
Parameter.description: ca guard password for EAP encryption

Parameter.name: certificate_file
Parameter.description: Filename of the certificate to be used for WPA-enterprise authentication with EAP method=TLS. This .p12 file should be placed into: [ACS_ROOT_FOLDER]/Executable/_Embedded/CERTIFICATE

Parameter.name: DHCP_ENABLED
Parameter.description: Enable dhcp on AP

Parameter.name: LOW_EXCLUDED_IP
Parameter.description: Defines the low end of the excluded ip range for dhcp

Parameter.name: HIGH_EXCLUDED_IP
Parameter.description: Defines the high end of the excluded ip range for dhcp

Parameter.name: DHCP_SUBNET
Parameter.description: Defines the dhcp subnet (with the addition of a mask)

Parameter.name: DHCP_SUBNET_MASK
Parameter.description: Defines the dhcp subnet mask

Parameter.name: DHCP_LEASE
Parameter.description: Defines the dhcp lease { days [ hours ] [ minutes ] | infinite }

Parameter.name: DHCP_GATEWAY
Parameter.description: The gateway that should be pushed to dhcp clients
